column1: The Pit Room////I had the 3 taco dinner
column3: brisket and pulled pork. I returned with my coworkers to get the feast number 1
column4: and both were absolutely mind blowingly fantastic. The people working both times were very kind and happy to explain everything. The meats were fresh
column7: I could go on forever describing the flavor and perfect balance of spices and sauces. The sides (especially mac and cheese) were also fantastic.
